history.text: Hi!
Hello
I have not seen this movie, but I have seen others in the series
What is the name of it?
Its one of those super hero movies called the avengers
Does it have a good plot?
I only saw iron man which i liked, but this is about all of them coming together
for the greater of good and evil maybe
Does it have Iron Man in it?
Yes Robert Downey JR
Chris Evans
What other superheroes are in it?
Mark Ruffalo Chris hemsworth
Loki
What type of person do you think would enjoy the movie?
Captain America the hulk
Probably a nerdy type
It would mostly be for fans of them?
I would think so this is the sixth film in the series of Marvel
Do you know anything about the plot, just in general?
I am not sure if you need to see all six in order to follow one another
That makes sense that you might need to.
Seems the avengers are together at first and then become divided on how to take on Loki
I am guessing he is the bad dude
Is Loki their nemesis, then? I know pretty much nothing about superheroes. :)
Yeah me either, so from what I am reading yes he is
That makes sense!
Must be pretty bad if they all have to team up to defeat him!
Do you know what types of ratings it has gotten from review sites and/or viewers?
Yeah seeems there is 5-6 of them and they all transform into their chracters or like iron man puts on a suit and he can fly
Rotten tomatoes gave it 8/10
Oh, that's pretty good!
Cinema score gave it an A plus
metacritic score only gave it 69/100
Sounds like it's a good movie for people who like that genre. Is it an action movie, do you know?
Oops! That's not a good score.
Yes very action'y
It takes place in NYC
Sounds busy and full of action, then.
Are there any other things about the movie that might help me know whether to watch it?
Loki uses a scepter as a weapon and tries to shut down a generator, seems like he is trying to destroy the city becuase some of them are evacuating civilians
Sounds scary!
Iron mans suit fails and he is falling to the ground only to be saved by the Hulk
I think we're supposed to spend 20 minutes doing this, right? I guess we're about halfway done, but I'm running out of ideas of what to ask!
That sounds interesting! Are there a lot of special effects with the powers the superheroes have?
I thought it was at least 12 turns which we have done, but yeah I am not sure if the 12 tuens was supposed to take 20 minutes maybe
How long is the movie?
I think it said both, but I could be wrong. Just let me know when you feel it has been enough. I think I can answer the question being posed to me.
I would say yes, I saw Iron man which I loved actually so I might go see this just to see the other aspects of the supoer heroes and the villian
Are you interested in the movie after reading about it?
Yes because I would like to see how all the other super heroes use their special powers
I remember watching the incredible hulk when I was a kid
I just don't know all these others like Captain america, loki, Thor etc
At least watching it will help introduce you to them!
I think so too!
I have the hit at almost 19 minutes
I remember the Incredible Hulk being Bill Bixby. :) I just don't know much about superheroes.
I think thats probably pretty good?
Sure! We can go if you feel comfortable with it. Thanks for telling me about the movie!
OK cool, thanks you sorry i wasnt really good at this lol
That's okay! Thank you! Have a great day.
bye!
you too!

uid1response.feedback: The other person didn't do a bad job explaining the movie, but this type of movie just isn't the kind I would watch. I don't know anything about superheroes, so I didn't get excited hearing about the plot of it. I'm glad the other participant was interested in the movie, though! It's neat that it appealed to them.
